title: Full Integration + Preview Shader + Pipeline Wiring

criteria.text: shaders/asset_preview.wgsl exists with vs_main and fs_main entry points
Preview shader has PreviewUniforms with view_proj, camera_pos, light_dir, ambient
Preview shader reads vertex attributes: position (vec3), normal (vec3), color (vec4)
Half-Lambert diffuse + Blinn-Phong specular lighting in fragment shader
Full pipeline flows through all 5 stages: Draw2D -> Extrude -> Sculpt -> Color -> Save
Stage transitions validate prerequisites (e.g., need outlines before extrude)
Stage transitions preserve existing state (switching back doesn't lose work)
3D preview renders with proper lighting via orbit camera in Stages 2-5
Canvas renders 2D outlines with grid background in Stage 1
Orbit camera supports mouse drag rotation and scroll wheel zoom
GPU buffers use VERTEX | COPY_DST for dynamic vertex/index data
Canvas line buffer rebuilt each frame
Preview mesh buffer rebuilt only on mesh change (dirty flag)
UI overlay renders on top of both canvas and 3D views
All input is routed through battle_editor.rs event loop
cargo check passes with 0 errors for both binaries

verification_commands.description: Shader has required uniforms and entry points
Stage state machine and render generation exist
